opis: KUĆA, PRODAJA, ZAGREB, REMETE, 566 m2, 6-sobna Prodaje se prekrasna obiteljska kuća površine 566 m2 s bazenom. Kuća se nalazi na Remetama. Kuća se sastoji od 3 etaže; - PODRUM stvarne površine 226 m2 - sastoji se od garaže, gospodarskog prostora, prostora za druženje s vinskim podrumom, welness prostora (sauna, jacuzzi), fitness prostora, hodnika te wc-a. - PRIZEMLJE stvarne površine 265 m2 - sastoji se od dnevnog boravka, kuhinje, blagovaonice, spavaće sobe s vlastitom kupaonicom, hodnika, kupaonice, terase te bazena. - 1. KAT stvarne površine 169 m2 - sastoji se od master spavaće sobe i tri manje spavaće sobe svaka sa vlastitom kupaonicom. Kuća je izgrađena 2013. godine. armirano - betonske gradnje. Kuća posjeduje garažu i parking za 2 automobila. Grijanje je i podno i zidno. Kuća posjeduje dva lifta koji idu kroz sve etaže. U izgradnji i uređenju su korišteni vrhunski materijali, a vanjska stolarija je drvo aluminijska sa dvostrukim termo staklom. Kuća je zbog svoje izuzetne atraktivne lokacije, predivnog pogleda i povezanosti javnim prijevozom idealna za miran i ugodan obiteljski život. U blizini kuće nalazi se autobusna stanica, trgovina, park te igralište za djecu. Kuća posjeduje uporabnu dozvolu, mogućnost kupovine na kredit. HOUSE, FOR SALE, ZAGREB, REMETE, 566 m2, 6 bedrooms A beautiful family house with a surface area of 566 m2 with a pool is for sale. The house is located in Remete. The house consists of 3 floors: BASEMENT with a real area of ​​226 m2 - consists of a garage, utility space, space for socializing with a wine cellar, wellness area (sauna, jacuzzi), fitness area, hallway, and toilet. GROUND FLOOR with a real area of ​​265 m2 - consists of a living room, kitchen, dining room, bedroom with its own bathroom, hallway, bathroom, terrace, and pool. 1st FLOOR with a real area of ​​169 m2 - consists of a master bedroom and three smaller bedrooms, each with its own bathroom. The house was built in 2013, with reinforced concrete construction. The house has a garage and parking for 2 cars. Heating is both underfloor and wall. The house has two elevators that go through all floors. High-quality materials were used in construction and decoration, and the external joinery is wood-aluminum with double thermal glass. Due to its exceptional attractive location, beautiful view, and public transport connectivity, the house is ideal for a peaceful and pleasant family life. Nearby, there is a bus stop, a shop, a park, and a playground for children. The house has an occupancy permit and the possibility of purchasing on credit.
